description:
Taiyou Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyouichirou. What drastic steps will Taiyou have to take to save Mutsumi?! A spy family comedy - the mission begins!

(Source: MANGA Plus)
synonyms: ปฏิบัติการลับบ้านโยซากุระ
La misión de la familia Yozakura

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Espionage
tags.description: Prominently features characters infiltrating an organization in order to steal sensitive information.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Mixed Gender Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several people, regardless of gender, who are romantically interested in them.

title.native: 夜桜さんちのミニ作戦
夜桜さんちの大作戦 第2期

node.description: **Tooru Kanegae** is a Japanese sound production manager.

__Website | Twitter__ Birth: CHiCO's year of birth and any further information of her early life is currently unknown or not publicly revealed. Her birth was privately held, and only shown to be on a January 27. Biography: CHiCO is a female japanese singer that is currently under the label: MusicRay'n Inc. While growing up CHiCO was very interested in anison (a term used to abbreviate Anime song, but is also used generally when referring to anime music that has a focus on opening and ending theme songs). Upon entering high school she was introduced to a voice training teacher by an acquaintance she knew at the time, this pushed her to become a professional singer. In the summer of 2013, CHiCO entered the national singer audition "Utakatsu!" (specializing in "Anison" and "Vocaloid") hosted by Sony Music Entertainment SD Group. She won the grand prize at the contest, which led to a decision to collaborate with the creator group "[HoneyWorks](https://anilist.co/staff/146863/HoneyWorks)". On the 6th of August, 2014, CHiCO debuted with the opening theme song for the anime "Ao Haru Ride" named "Sekai wa Koi Ni Ochiteiru" under the guise of "CHiCO with HoneyWorks". This was her official debut as a singer. On the 18th of November, 2015, CHiCO together with HoneyWorks released their first album named "Sekai Ha i Ni Michiteiru". This was CHiCO's first ever album release, and the album sold 24,000 copies during its first week of sale.

__[Official Site](https://ikimonogakari.com/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCflAJoghlGeSkdz5eNIl-sg)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/IKIMONOofficial)__

__ikimono-gakari__ (いきものがかり) is a Japanese rock band. They record on Sony Music Japan's EPIC Records label.  The band was formed in Kanagawa Prefecture in February 1999 by Hotaka Yamashita and [Yoshiki Mizuno](https://anilist.co/staff/168854/Yoshiki-Mizuno), and was later joined by lead vocalist [Kiyoe Yoshioka](https://anilist.co/staff/159004) in December the same year. Hotaka Yamashita later left the band as of July 2021.
_Note: Not to be confused with the veteran [Animator](https://anilist.co/staff/288485)._
__Masanori Yumiya__ is a Japanese animation planner and producer.
